rest
Class Mapping

java.lang.Object
  rest.Mapping

public class Mapping
extends java.lang.Object

Performs two major tasks: - constructor inspects SQL database and generates schema, - printD2RQ translates connection, entities and relations into D2RQ Mapping Language.
